channel.title: Reminder: Report Topics
channel.description:
This is just a reminder to let you guys know that you have the ability to report topics for moderators to see. You'll see an option marked "[b]Report to moderator[/b]" on the bottom right of every posted message in a thread. So if you see a topic/message that does not follow the rules, we suggest you report it so we can take action.
Clicking this button will add the topic/message to a list that we moderators... well.. moderate :rolleyes:.
- The Moparscape Staff Team.

item.title: Reminder: Report Topics
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

This is just a reminder to let you guys know that you have the ability to report topics for moderators to see. You’ll see an option marked “Report to moderator” on the bottom right of every posted message in a thread. So if you see a topic/message that does not follow the rules, we suggest you report it so we can take action.

Clicking this button will add the topic/message to a list that we moderators… well… moderate :rolleyes:.

  • The Moparscape Staff Team.
